description: Designed for discerning ears that crave for satisfying bass with extraordinary detail, Vortex reference in-ear headphones feature Moshi Audio's proprietary RigidBody driver housing aimed to deliver fast articulate bass without distortion.  The drive units consist of high-definition HR8 neodymium drivers housed in sintered steel alloy which minimize cavity-induced coloration.  This design not only vastly improves low frequency extension, but also renders silky smooth highs.
